description: Commentary In 1885, a ceremonial final spike was driven into a piece of railway track in B.C. to signify the completion of Canada’s transcontinental railway. description: In Powell River on B.C.’s northern Sunshine Coast, a local theatre has been entertaining residents for more than a century. description: British Columbia’s Official Opposition BC United party now says it will run some candidates in the Oct. 19 election, despite suspending its campaign last week to support the B.C. description: A potential Chinese ban on Canadian canola could cost billions, but thanks to market diversification, the industry is now better equipped to handle such a setback compared to when a similar measure was imposed in 2019, a report says. description: Canada Post is proposing an increase to regulated postage rates next year, bringing the price of most stamps up by 25 cents to $1.24.
